name: Don't Look Here
description:
In Don’t Look Here the player controls a human where the they use letter keys that makes the player move and interact with objects. During the game zombies and pickups appear on various points of the map and the goal of the game is to stay alive by finding supplies and avoiding the sight and detection of the zombies. As the game progresses, the player’s health decreases and more zombies spawn, making it more difficult to avoid detection while maintaining health.  

--DOWNLOAD--

Download the zipped folder and unzip to the desired location on your computer. The application launcher will be in the main folder.
